mision.texto: To contribute to the integral development of communities surrounding the Pico de Orizaba National Park, strengthening their social, economic and environmental resilience.

vision.descripcion: We aspire to be a reference for inclusive and sustainable community transformation.
vision.punto1: Conserve and restore the environment of the Pico de Orizaba National Park.
vision.punto2: Guarantee basic services and reduce marginalization and social backwardness.
vision.punto3: Raise the quality of education and health.
vision.punto4: Promote local and solidarity economic development that generates decent employment.
vision.punto5: Channel the strength and leadership of youth as an engine of transformation.
vision.punto6: Exercise good governance and transparency in finances, inspiring confidence among donors and allies.

ods.descripcion1: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.
ods.descripcion2: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
ods.punto3: SDG 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth
ods.descripcion3: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all.
ods.descripcion4: Reduce inequality within and among countries.
ods.descripcion5: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.
ods.descripcion6: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
ods.descripcion7: Sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss.
ods.punto8: SDG 16: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
ods.descripcion8: Promote just, peaceful and inclusive societies.
ods.descripcion9: Revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development and strengthen the means of implementation.

cPreguntas.descripcion: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our work

faqsLeft.pregunta: What type of projects does CIMA A.C. develop?
faqsLeft.respuesta: We develop projects focused on environmental conservation, education, health, local economic development and community strengthening.

faqsLeft.pregunta: Who is part of the CIMA A.C. team?
faqsLeft.respuesta: Our team is composed of multidisciplinary professionals committed to social development.

faqsRight.pregunta: How can I participate as a volunteer?
faqsRight.respuesta: You can contact us through our volunteer form or attend our recruitment sessions.
Yes, we accept both in-kind and monetary donations to support our projects.

iniciativas.subtitulo: Projects that transform communities and protect our natural environment

items.descripcionLarga: Comprehensive reforestation program in Pico de Orizaba National Park, focused on native species and restoration of degraded ecosystems to combat climate change.
Vocational guidance program aimed at young people from rural communities, providing tools for academic and professional decision-making aligned with their interests and local development.
Community health campaigns that include medical consultations, vaccination campaigns, preventive health education and nutrition programs to improve families' quality of life.
Implementation of digital literacy programs and access to educational technologies to reduce the digital divide in rural communities and improve educational opportunities.
Entrepreneurship training programs, microcredits and development of local productive chains to generate decent jobs and strengthen the community economy.
Local flora and fauna conservation initiatives, environmental education and promotion of sustainable practices for the protection of Pico de Orizaba National Park.

cta.descripcion: Join our initiatives and be part of the change our communities need.
